sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Col, Row, Container, ListGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { ProductDetailsAction } from '../Actions/ProductDetailsAction' import Loader from '../Components/Loader' import Message from '../Components/Message' function ProductsScreen({ match }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {loading,product,error} = useSelector(state=>state.ProductDetails) const data = product useEffect(() => { dispatch(ProductDetailsAction(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch,match]); return ( <> {data.name} = 0.5 ? "fas fa-star" : data.rating > 0 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 1.5 ? "fas fa-star" : data.rating > 1 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 2.5 ? "fas fa-star" : data.rating > 2 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 3.5 ? "fas fa-star" : data.rating > 3 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 4.5 ? "fas fa-star" : data.rating > 4 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> {` `}{data.numReviews} reviews Price : {data.price} $ description : {data.description} Price {data.price} $ Status {data.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Disabled"} 0 ? false : true} style={{ textAlign: 'center' }}> ) } export default ProductsScreen
